name: Snowdrop Localization Package
summary: A LOCPACK file is a localization package used by a video game developed using Ubisoft's Snowdrop game engine. It contains plain text data used to translate a game into another language. Games that use LOCPACK files include Tom Clancy's The Division and Mario + Rabbids.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename ".locpack" to ".csv" and open as CSV file
